channel.title: Posts on BasedOrbwalker
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on BasedOrbwalker

item.title: Cool Menu
item.description: Cool and simple menu based on Windows Forms to configure everything in-game.

item.title: Minimal Overlay
item.description: Showing stats, important info without allocating too much resources to keep your gameplay smooth.

item.title: Pixel-Perfect Orbwalker
item.description: Operates by analyzing the game’s visuals at a pixel level, allowing the software to precisely calculate the optimal positioning for each attack.
